node.title: This dog is worth $688 million. His handlers are selling this Miami villa once owned by Madonna
node.description: The dog, Gunther VI, is a descendant of Gunther III, a dog thatÂ inherited a multimillion-dollar trust from German countess Karlotta Liebenstein in 1992.
node.content:
["Gunther the German shepherd spent a recent morning playing with his tennis ball, rolling in the grass, slobbering and napping a lot.", "Later, the dog\u00a0had a meeting with the real estate agents selling his\u00a0Miami mansion,\u00a0which\u00a0his handlers bought from Madonna.", "And of course, Gunther was wearing a\u00a0faux diamond dog collar for the meeting. His real gold collar is back at his main home in Tuscany.", "The villa with views of Florida's\u00a0Biscayne Bay went on sale this week for $US31.75 million ($43.7 million).", "It is a whopping increase from the purchase two decades ago from the pop star for $US7.5 million ($10.33 million).", "Gunther VI inherited his vast fortune, including the eight-bedroom waterfront home, from his grandfather Gunther IV.\u00a0", "At least that's what the handlers who manage the estate say.", "", "
The dog, apparently relaxing by the pool.(AP Photo: Lynne Sladky)
", "The dog's lineage dates back\u00a0to when Gunther III inherited a multimillion-dollar trust from his\u00a0late owner, German countess Karlotta Liebenstein,\u00a0after\u00a0she died in 1992.", "Since then, a group of handlers have helped maintain a jet-setting lifestyle for a succession of dogs.", "There are trips to Italy and the Bahamas, where the latest Gunther recently dined out at restaurants every evening\u00a0because\u00a0his handlers like to make sure he's well socialised.", "A chef cooks his breakfast each morning made of the finest meat, fresh vegetables and rice. Sometimes he enjoys caviar, but there's never any kibble in sight.", "He travels by private jet, works on obedience skills daily with his trainer and sleeps in a lavish round, red velvet bed overlooking the bay.", "", "
Gunther VI sitting on his\u00a0red velvet bed which overlooks Florida's\u00a0Biscayne Bay.(AP: Lynne Sladky)
", "Real estate agent Ruthie Assouline said the dog lives in Madonna's former master bedroom.\u00a0", "Ms\u00a0Assouline and her husband Ethan are in charge of the listing for the\u00a0property which sits alongside a row of waterfront homes\u00a0on the same street Sylvester Stallone once lived.", "One of Gunther's main caretakers,\u00a0Carla Riccitelli, is on a board that manages the dog's\u00a0trust which is now\u00a0worth almost $US500 million ($688 million).\u00a0", "They\u00a0decide\u00a0when to buy and sell assets and\u00a0real estate.\u00a0The group has even purchased sports teams, including a men's soccer team and women's swimming team.", "And with the\u00a0Miami real estate market running so hot, the board decided it was a good\u00a0time to sell.", "", "
Gunther VI chases a tennis ball thrown by\u00a0handler Stacey Marino.(AP:\u00a0Lynne Sladky)
", "Ms Riccitelli said she\u00a0met the group taking care of Gunther III\u00a0nearly 30 years ago.", "She said she instantly connected with the dog and the mission of the trust, so she joined the team which also\u00a0formed a program to help care for other animals called Gunther Rescue.", "She has taken care of the last three Gunthers and often brings the current dog with her on routine trips to the market or visits to the kennel where she cares for strays.", "\"He's not aggressive at all \u2026 he's very good with other animals,\" she said.", "\"They're very protective with their owner, with their people. They like to have the family around, so I usually invite friends with other dogs over.\"", "AP"]
